description:
Tyki Mikk, as he appears in D.Gray-man Hallow.
Since his battle with http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker] in Noah`s Ark and his subsequent transformation, Tyki`s complexion has become darker, even in his human form. His hair has grown past shoulder length and is now worn in a ponytail. His chest is marred with deep scar wounds that still ache from the battle in which he received them. As a Noah, an additional, large stigmata has appeared on his neck.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Tyki Mikk
